name: Red Frontier
description: A bold, ruby-red whiskey cocktail with cranberry, cola, grenadine and mint. Refreshing and balanced, perfect for summer evenings.
flavorProfile: Smooth and slightly sweet with a minty finish and fruity depth. Balanced between classic warmth and modern freshness.
instructions: Fill a tumbler glass with crushed ice.
Add whiskey, cranberry juice and cola.
Slowly pour in grenadine to create a gradient.
Garnish with a sprig of fresh mint.
